Package game.enemies

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.enemies.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Despawnable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Ally, Animal, Invader, Marine, StormveilEnemy, Undead
public abstract class Enemy extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor implements Despawnable, Resettable
An abstract class that represents the Enemy that can attack the Player. Inherits from Actor. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:, Po Han Tay

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints, int spawningChance, int despawningChance, String type, int runeMin, int runeMax, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.weapons.WeaponItem weapon)
      Enemy Constructor. Will call setters to set data attributes of Enemy using parameters given. Calls parent class to set inherited data attributes. Default create an empty HashMap for behaviours at creation.
      Parameters:
      name - : The name of the Enemy
      displayChar - : The character that will represent the Enemy in the display
      hitPoints - : The Enemy's starting hit points
      spawningChance - : The percentage chance the Enemy can spawn every turn.
      despawningChance - : The percentage chance the Enemy can despawn every turn.
      type - : The type/factin this Enemy belongs to.
      runeMin - : The minimum number of Runes given by the Enemy when killed by the Player.
      runeMax - : The maximum number of Runes given by the Enemy when killed by the Player.
      weapon - : The weapon used by the Enemy to attack.

      public Map<Integer,Behaviour> getBehaviours()
      A method to return the behaviours data attribute.
      Returns:
      the behaviours HashMaps which shows the number of behaviours that can be performed.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action playTurn(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.ActionList actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actions.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Display display)
      At each turn, select a valid action the Enemy can perform by looping through the behaviours HashMap. If there are no performable actions, do nothing.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - : Collection of possible Actions for this Enemy.
      lastAction - : The Action this Enemy took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction().
      map - : The map containing the Enemy.
      display - : The I/O object to which messages may be written.
      Returns:
      the valid action that can be performed in that iteration or null if no valid action is found.

    • despawn

      public boolean despawn()
      A method to despawn the Enemy.
      Specified by:
      despawn in interface Despawnable
      Returns:
      true if Enemy despawns and false otherwise.

    • reset

      Specified by:
      reset in interface Resettable
      Parameters:
      map - : The Game Map.
      location - : THe location of the Last Site of Lost Grace the Player rested at.
